Description: MIJ, made in japan, Gibson, Lespaul, White, SG, Höfner, Duesenberg, Ibanez, ATELIER Z, ARIA, ESP, Caparison, Killer, COMBAT GUITARS, GUYATONE, Greco, Sugi Guitars, TEISCO, DEVISERA, Nil, Bacchus, VANZANDT, Fernandes, Fender Japan, Fujigen, MOON GUITARS, momose, Yairi Guitar, YAMAHA, TOKAI, Zemaitis, VOX, B, C, Rich, Epiphone, Gibson, Gretsch, Suhr, Schecter, Charvel, Jackson, Dean, Tom Anderson, Fender, Paul Reed Smith, Melancon, Mosrite, Rickenbacker, Robert Benedetto, Washburn, Ibanez, kramer, EDWARDS, Burny, Grassroots, 1987 YAMAHA RGX-620J Very Good condition.Made in Japan Down from here, Photo is dent and scratches etc.. About scratches that are hard to see. To make it easy to understand the condition of the scratches, I lighted the light strongly. 1987 YAMAHA RGX-620J Very Good condition.Made in Japan Body Bass wood. Neck Maple. Frets 24F. Scale 24.75inch ( 628mm ) Gibson Medium Scale. Nut Width About 1.69 inch (43mm). Pickup YAMAHA YGH-F1BO. Control 2 Volume. 1 Tone. 3-Way PU Selector. Bridge Rockin' Magic Pro. Machine heads YAMAHA Japan. Color Black. Weight About 7.5 Pound ( 3.4 Kg ). This is Used Guitar. Whammy bar is not original. __However you can Hard arming action. When I got it, The electric circuit was in a no good condition due to deterioration. Therefore,I changed all electric circuits to New ones. It is 3 Pots and 3way toggle switch and Output jack and Capacitor and Wiring. Lost parts are the 3 lock nuts and the back spring cavity plate. There are scratches and dents. But fatal damage is not. I was shooting a lot of photos. Please confirm with a photograph. 1987, Heavy Metal Music was epidemic in japan and RGX has been release. Its looks is suitable for heavy metal music. I love guitar design of RGX series. And, in a conversation with buyers of eBay, I heard many opinions that Rockin' Magic Pro likes. I also like the unique feeling of this Rockin 'Magic Pro. But what I especially like is this looks. The neck is gibson medium scale and, narrow neck. I recommend to short fingers guitar players. RGX will be compared with Ibanez RG. But I think that I resemble an ESP guitars. When I grasp the neck of RGX, I remember the ESP guitar. About guitar play, Current state, the space between the strings and the frets is very narrow. And, remaining amount of the Frets are many. Thanks to that, I feels very easy to play the guitar. About the pickups, It is YAMAHA Original. However the sound of the bridge pickup, I feels like a Stratocaster. I felt like it was a single coil. If you dislike this bridge's output sound, I recommend you change the bridge's pickup. It is cleanliness. I polished with guitar exclusive polish, so it is in a very clean state. I after the finger board cleaning, painted beeswax. The aim is moisturizing and and protection. Current neck condition, very good ! roughly straight ! There is no problem with the Truss rod and it can be adjusted. Remaining the frets are 95% on average. You can play immediately after it is delivered to you. I was set new strings. Regular tuning. ( Inch : 009, 011, 016, 024, 032, 042 ) Guitar playing, is comfortable. All is working well. It is in a very good condition. The Truss rod Wrench is not included. All Original.Note : I changed all electric circuits to New ones. Note : The whammy bar is not original.
